name: Dangerous Pricks
description:
Seduce, threaten, and bribe your way across the old west!

You take the role of a cactus outlaw with one goal: get across the border with as much money as possible. Choose from one of three starting decks, customize your cactus, and try not to lose your nerve!

Created for the Gay Western Jam by Peter Wallis

Menu Music from Entice Media Works
Battle Music from Sweden Stock Music
